title: Geox Men's Low-Top Sneakers
features: fit type: Bear in mind that Geox shoes have a comfortable fit, therefore we recommend choosing half a size smaller than your usual size
description: Iconic sneaker with a vulcanised box sole, extraordinary flexibility and peerless comfort. Delivering an outstanding grip and extraordinary durability, the rubber sole is endowed with Italian-patented Geox perforations that make it breathable and waterproof, reinforcing the effect of the mounting insole in 3D mesh which boosts breathability and provides a cushioned effect and comfort. With a lining in breathable mesh and a removable practical hygienic footbed, it has been lined in leather for a constant sensation of dryness that heightens the sensation of wellbeing. The classic Geox rubber sole is based on an exclusive patent: the combination of the perforated sole and the resistant breathable and waterproof membrane allow for natural temperature regulation, thereby creating a microclimate inside the shoe that keeps feet dry and comfortable for the whole day.
